attributes.action: Refer any MP claiming expenses deemed to be exessive or possibly fraudulent in nature, to the police for investigation and where evidence is found to support this, prosecution under the law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any MP who has submitted a expenses claim in connection with their duties who are, on examination of their claim, suspected of:
fraud by false representation, 
false accounting, 
or obtaining money by deception,
be refered to the police for independant investigation, and where evidence exists, subject to  prosecution under the law as would any other person suspected of defrauding the taxpayer.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
